entry.title: Buildings of Tenryu-ji・天龍寺の建物

link.title: Buildings of Tenryu-ji・天龍寺の建物

entry.content:
We’ve been staying in our neighborhood these days, walking to places nearby.

This is an architecural look at Tenryu-ji Temple; the Kuri and Hojo, from the garden side. There used to be too many people around to shoot this properly, but nowadays we have it mostly to ourselves.

entry.title: Taizo-in・退蔵院
entry.content:
While sitting at Taizo-in’s Yoko-en garden, the sun snuck out for a second on an otherwise rainy day, and I was lucky to catch it.

Taizo-in, along with the other temples at the Myoshin-ji temple complex will close starting tomorrow, due to concerns about the Coronavirus.
